item.title: Reading 01: To be a Hack
item.description: Based on the readings and my experience, a hacker is someone who acts based on certain impulses. The best way to evaluate whether or not someone is a hacker is, in my opinion, to examine what their motivation is. My idea of a hacker in terms of computing is not the more modern definition of someone who cracks systems, but is more in line with someone who modern culture would now call a maker

item.title: Reading 00: Question 2: Not just for Superheroes
